root.name: Quattro Adventure
root.description: OverviewBoomerang KidThe Boomerang Kid must collect the boomerangs scattered abroad in the outback. Super Robin HoodRobin Hood must rescue Maid Marian by fighting and making his way through the treacherous Nottingham Castle. Treasure Island DizzyDizzy is trapped on an island, and he needs to find his way home. Linus SpaceheadAn alien from another planet, Linus, needs to find his way home by collecting the radio shards scattered around the land. The radio is his only hope to phone home for help.
